title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Dawn over Cartman's house. He runs into his mother's bedroom

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Mom! Mom! Get up, we have to go!  MOM, GET UP!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh, Poopie-kins, it's very early.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Mom, I told you! The new Sony PSP game machines go on sale at seven a.m. today. I have to be the first to get one! Come on!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Sweetie, can't we go after school?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Everyone's moms are taking their kids after school! We're outsmarting everyone by getting to the store right when it opens! Let's go!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Liane's car, some time later. She and Cartman drive along, Cartman bouncing happily in his seat

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I can't wait to see the look on everyone's faces when I show up to school with a PSP! I wonder if Kyle will cry? Oh PLEASE let Kyle cry!  What the hell?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Before them is a long line of people in front of Luau's Toys waiting for the PSP. The camera reaches the front of the line only to find Kenny right at the front door. He's the first one in line. Cartman approaches Kenny

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny, when did you get here?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (Friday)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Friday?! Aw, Jesus!  I'll just... sort of get in here- in here.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hey dickhole! What do you think you're doing?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Uh, my friend Kenny was saving my place in line.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: There's no saving place, fourthie! Get to the back or we'll beat your face in!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh, Goddamnit!  They'd better not sell out!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The bus stop, later in the day. Kenny is playing with his PSP as Stan and Kyle look on. Stan and Kyle weren't in line

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That thing is pretty cool. What games did you get with it?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It's a game called "Heaven versus Hell." Kenny commands the armies of heaven against the forces of Satan.  Dude, you see what Kenny got?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: YES YES, I KNOW! UP YOURS, KYLE!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Wuh what'd I do?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: JUST SHUT YOUR JEW MOUTH!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: "Congratulations! You have reached ...lever nine!"

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Wow, level nine already? Dude, you kick ass in "Heaven versus Hell."

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah, Kenny finally found something he's really good at.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A montage follows. Kenny is seen in class playing on his PSP, then in the cafeteria, then in the playground, then in his bedroom at night. He reaches lever 24. He's then seen at the amusement park with his family, still playing with his PSP, then in "The Mine Shaft" roller coaster, where he reaches lever 45. He's seen on the bus playing on his PSP while the other students are having fun, then in Le Bijou playing while Stan and Kyle watch a movie, then on the sidewalk passing some hot babes - he doesn't look up to acknowledge them, then in his bed again at night. He reaches lever 54.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny's house, day, the kitchen. He's still playing on his PSP

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny? Kenny, are you still playin' with that thing?  Kenny, it's been two weeks and you've done nothin' else!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (I could get to level sixty!)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Who cares if you almost made it to lever sixty?! You're wastin' your life, Kenny! If you died tomorrow, what would you have to show for it?! You'er gonna end up wishin' you'd done more with your life, just like your dead-beat father!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hey, I heard that, bitch!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I wasn't talkin' to you, asshole!!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: How about I come in there and kick your teeth in!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I'd like to see you try!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny leaves the house and goes to the sidewalk

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Goddamnit, do you have to smart off at me in my own house?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It's my house too, you no-good loser!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You have reached level sixty!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (Yes! Woohoo! I did it! I reached lever s-!)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh yeah, lever four, sweet!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The street. Kenny's body lies on the road. Eventually his soul rises out of his body

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (Hey, that's odd.)  (Hey, I'm floating. That can't be! Hey wait!)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He reaches heaven, right side up, and bounces once before landing. He walks towards the Golden Gates

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Open the gate!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Open the gate!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Welcome to the Kingdom of Heaven, Kenny. I am Peter.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (What the fuck is going on?)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: There isn't much time, Kenny. You're dead, but, your death was no accident. Heaven needs you.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Come! There is much to discuss.  Things are not good in Heaven, Kenny. Satan is planning a massiva attack and he knows we are too few in number to stop him! God has changed the rules here. For ages, only Mormons were allowed into Heaven.  But knowing that Hell was becoming much larger, God decided to let more people cross over so that he could build an army as well, an army that YOU must command.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (That I what??)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The Sony PSP was built by God, to determine who on Earth had the best skills to defeat the armies of Satan. You... are the best. YOU, are the only hope for the universe.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: In a great courtyard outside the super-basilica. An angel addresses the others

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Satan's army grows as we speak. The Dark Lord knows that our armies are few in number, and unorgamized. So our only hope... is perfect strategy.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A child? This is God's solution?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He beat Satan's army in over three thousand separate simulations.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Archangel Michael, what say you?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The child did something none of us could: Reach lever sixty on the PSP. Now I don't know if that's luck or perseverence, but it's Goddamned impressive. All right, Kenny, let me show you what we're up against.  This is the Kingdom of Heaven. Satan's armies will attack the gate ...here. They are... ten billion in number. Maybe more.  Our armies are here, here, and here. Just under... ten thousand strong.  We are outnumbered and in need of someone who can singlehandedly bring the whole Dark Empire down. Basically, Kenny, you... are Keanu Reeves.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell. Satan's armies mill about, the troops arm each other. Satan addresses them

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: My fellow damned souls! Now is the time for our assault!  You know no fear! You will drink the blood of angels! We go now! Nothing can stop us!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Step aside! Step aside, I say!  Satan! God has mocked thee once again!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: My spy!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: God has found a way to defeat your army.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Impossible! How?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A young man. Basically, he he's like Keanu Reeves.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh Jesus Christ.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: My Lord. My Lord, we must attack, now!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: What's the point?! They have a Keanu Reeves now.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Do not fear, my Lord. Your army is great!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Very well.  Demon Army, begin your march on Heaven!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Michael and Kenny walk to one of the ramparts and look out over Heaven

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Up here, you get the best tactical view to protect the fortress. It is from here, Kenny, that you shall command the armies of heaven.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: (All right. How am I supposed to do that?)

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Simple. You will use... this.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: This golden PSP is king of all PSPs.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hail the holy PSP.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It works just like the ones we sent to Earth. All the commands you make will be sent to the troops down on the battlefield. All you have to do is play the game, Kenny. Only this time, It's for reals.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Gabriel returns with news!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's army is departing! They head now for the Gates of Heaven.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Prepare the troops!  We must be ready for them!  The time is at hand, Kenny. The stage is set and the final battle between Heaven and Hell is about to begin! The fate of the outcome is in your hands.  Where'd he go?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's Pass Hospital. The paddles have been taken to Kenny and fired away.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Doctor! Doctor, we have a pulse!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Then that's it! We brought him back.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Amazing, doctor! You've revived somebody who's been legally dead for almost a day!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Call the parents. They're going to be shocked to find out... their son is alive.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's Pass, later

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It's the latest in electro-plastilical science. Your son's organs are all functioning again.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It's a miracle... Kenny, you're alive.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I'm a-fraid he can't respond to you. You see, being dead for that long, most of Kenny's brain cells died from lack of oxygen. Your son is alive, but, in what we call a "persistant meditative staute."

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Will he ever recover?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I'm afraid no. Brain cells cannot be repaied once dead. But his soul is still in here.  Almost... trapped in here, if you will. Kenny is the same as he ever was. It's just that, now, he's more like ...a tomato.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He can't more on hiw own-ah how will he eat?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A feeding tube. It pumps a nutrient paste directly into Kenny's stomache. With it we can actually keep Kenny the tomato alive for years.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Back in heave, business goes on as usual

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A feeding tube?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yes. Apparently they're using machines to keep them alive.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: But... that's not natural. God intended Kenny to die! What are these people doing?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The child's soul is now trapped inside his vegetative body. We have no one to command the troops with the PSP's

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: And Satan's armies are approaching.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh God-damnit

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A brick building. Inside, a lawyer sees the four boys.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Boys I want to thank you for coming down to my office on such short notice.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Are we in trouble or something?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No. Boys, I'm a laywer. Your friend Kenny has passed away and I've called you here to read his will.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny had a will?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: In the highly liekly event of my death, I, Kenny McCormick, wish to leave all my belongings to my good friends, Stan and Kyle. Dudes, you were the friends a guy could have.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh wow...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That's... really touching.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Fag!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: To Eric Cartman: Eric, I never really liked you. But then, nobody does. You have no ability to feel, and you are going to die alone and miserable. It is only because I feel so sorry for you that I leave you my Sony PSP.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh yeah! Oh yeah, baby! Who the man? Who the man?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: There is one more thing I would like to ask you all, as my friends. If I should ever be in a vegetative state and kept alive on life-support, please,...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Please what?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I don't know. I lost the last page.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Who cares? Kenny's dead!  When do I take possession of my PSP, sir?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It's right here, along with Kenny's other belongings. They're all yours.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yes!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He's alive!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: What?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny McCormick! He's alive at the hospital!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh my God!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Satan's armies continue their march to Heaven. Satan looks on through his crystal ball

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Your army nears the Kingdon of Heaven, my Lord.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I don't know if we should continue without knowing more about this Keanu Reeves God has.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Satan! I come bearing good news! The Keanu Reeves boy has been revived on Earth! His soul is no longer in Heaven.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Then God is helping us.  Full march, to the Gates of Heaven! Victory is ours!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The boys reached Hell's Pass and enter Kenny's recovery room

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny??

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny! You're alive!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Dude, how's you do that??

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He can't responde to you, boys. Being dead for that long caused severe damage to his brain,

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Well... well then he's NOT alive.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He's alive. He-ee smiles when I talk to him. I think...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That's not Kenny. Kenny sniffs paint and sets things on fire! Here, look. Kenny, Kenny look. Want a dollar?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I I don't know if it's right to keep Kenny alive on that machine. I I just... I don't know what he would want.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah, the lawyer lost that page.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh, I just remembered! Kenny told me this one time, that he wouldn't wanna be kept alive via feeding tube.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He did? When?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Um, it was um, this one time...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He did not say that! You just want him dead so you can have his stupid PSP!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Stupid? PSP is stupid?!  Did you all hear that??  Uh I mean, I mean this isn't about PSP, Kyle! This is about my friend, and his wishes. And Kenny said he didn't want to live like this!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He did not!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Did so!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Did not!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Fine! We'll see about this, you freakin' Jew!  I'm gonna get that feeding tube removed if I have to go all the way to the Supreme Court!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Heaven. The angels mill around inside the fortress

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Satan's army has crossed over the Plains of Limbo!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Then they will be here on the morrow. Without Kenny's soul here there will be nobody who can use the holy PSP.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No! There is another. A Japanese boy did make it to level fifty-nine.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Are you stupid, Uriel? Japanese people don't have souls!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah, Uriel!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh, right right, I'm sorry

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny remains our only hope! Here is what we must do.  Gabriel and Uriel, you go down to Earth and try to get that feeding tube removed. In the meantime we will put all our troops at Heaven's Gate. We will try to keep Hell's Aermy from breaking through as long as possible. Hopefull, it will be long enough to get our Keanu Reeves back.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The Colorado Supreme Court, day.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You see your honor, I was the only one that Kenny McCormick told his wishes to. And Kenny told me specifically that he would never want to be kept alive on a machine. What they're doing to him ...is not right.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Well I'm sorry, young man, but the parents want their child kept alive. I don't believe you have any legal authority here.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I do have legal authority, your honor. You see, I was Kenny's... BFF.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Best friends forever?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That's right. Kenny and I have been BFFs since first grade. Here, look. Kenny has the other half of this BFF necklace. I believe you all know what that means, and how serious this is.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's Pass hospital, Kenny's room. Kenny's parents keep vigil with Stan and Kyle.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Look, Kenny, your friends are here to visit you again.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: But this just doesn't seem right.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Wha, what's the matter, doctor?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I'm afraid I've been given a court order to remove Kenny's feeding tube.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: What?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: He's right in here.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Cartman!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny's BFF says that Kenny didn't want to be kept alive artificially. The courts have determined we must obey his wish.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Cartman is NOT Kenny's BFF!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Sir, take a look at this.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That's all the verification we need. Pull the feeding tube, doctor.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No doctor! You can't!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I'm sorry. I have no choice.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's Pass hospital, outside. Uriel and Gabriel arrive

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Here is the hospital

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: This is hopeless, Gabriel. We cannot interact with anything on Earth, how could we possibly get a feeding tube removed?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That dirty no-good sonofabitch!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Now that Cartman got Kenny's feeding tube out, he he's gonna die for sure!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The tube has been removed?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: How can they let an eight-year-old decide Kenny's fate?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Apparently, some blessed child has done our work for us.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Good. Now all we must do is pray nobody interferes with the child's death a second time.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Dude, we have to do whatever we can to get that feeding tube put back in!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Let's go to the, uh, media. We'll make everyone in the country know that they're killing Kenny.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah, come on!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No! No, no boys! Aw Goddamnit!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: HBC World News. Splashy graphics.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: This is HBC News. A right-to-die case debate is heating up in Colorado,  where Kenny McCormick's feeding tube has been removed by his BFF.  Two boys are bringing national attention to this story by protesting outside the hospital.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell's Pass hospital, outside. The protest has begun

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Don't kill Kenny!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You bastards!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Don't kill Kenny!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You bastards!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No! No, they're not killing him, they're letting him die!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You bureaucrats have no right to play God and take that tube out!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Nono, see, they were playing God when they put the feeding tube IN!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: A woman was arrested for trying to bring food to the patient.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Get your man-hands off of me!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: However, a growing number of people are also standing behind Kenny's BFF, Eric Cartman.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We must respect the wishes of people's BFFs. Otherwise, all our BFF necklaces would become meaningless

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We all have BFFs, and we believe that a BFF is the highest legal authority.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: That's right. Respect our authoritih-m.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Satan watches on his TV, which is much nicer than the one in his bedroom. The hooded figure stands nearby

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: What mockery is this?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: My Lord...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The feeding tube has been pulled! If the child dies and his soul returns to heaven, God will have his Keanu Reeves!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Perhaps the child won't die in time.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Forget it! I'm calling the attack off!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No! Keep your army marching, my Lord. I will get that feeding tube put back in.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: How?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I will do what we always do: Use the Republicans.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The White house, a press conference on the lawn. People carry signs saying "Kenny Is Alive" "Murder Is Not A Choice" and "Don't Kill Kenny"

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We Republicans are deeply saddened by the tragic events in Colorado.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Removing the feeding tube is murder, hughughughughughugh...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Removing the feeding tube is murder!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Who are we to decide if Kenny should live or die?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Who are we to decide if Kenny should live or die?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Who are we to decide if Kenny should live or die?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It is God's will that he live!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: It is God's will that he LIVE!  Haaghaghaghaghaghagha...

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No no, you don't say that part.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No no, you don't say that part, haghaghaghagha.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Heaven't Gate. The armies of Hell converge in front of it

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Jesus, their army is massive.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Heaven help us.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: HBC World News.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The biggest battle of all time is about to begin: the battle of the feeding tube! As people on both sides of the argument vie for media attention.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny's hospital room. Both sides of the controversy chatter away

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We want all the country to see that Kenny is alive, and in pain!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I believe the people at home see he's NOT in pain because he's a tomato!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You say tomato, but I say Kenny!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You say Kenny, but I say tomato!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Tomato!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny! Kenny!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Tomato!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Uuhh, excuse me. I uh, just found the last page of Kenny's will.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: What?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: I found the page where Kenny specified his wishes about being on life support.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Well, what does it say?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: If I should ever be in a vegetative state and kept alive on life support, please...  for the love of God, don't ever show me in that condition on national television.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oooo.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oowhoops

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh geez. Maybe we let this thing get out of hand. This issue is so complicated, but... mmaybe we shhhould just let Kenny go in peace.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: You mean, Cartman's side is right?

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Cartman's side is right, for the wrong reasons. But we're wrong, for the right reasons.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yeah.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Come on, everybody. I think Kenny wants to be left alone.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: HBC World News.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We've just received word that Kenny McCormick... has passed away. The debate still rages on in America, but at least now, Kenny... is in a much more peaceful place.

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Heaven, inside the fortress. Angels scurry around in a panic

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The armies of Satan have already broken through the gate!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We're gonna die!!!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Send our troops to the battlefield! I'll command as best I can!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Michael! Michael!  The humans finally did the right thing!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Oh my God, they killed Kenny! Get him into the command station! Hurry!  Satan's army charges! Tell our troops what to do, Kenny!  So it begins.  Now we shall see the final battle between Heaven and Hell play out!  Yesss, good, Kenny! The angel spearmen are taking out their demon soulrippers! Oh, the cavalry angels are clashing with their Black Knights! Oh my God! My God, this battle is epic! Ohh, they're bringing in their demon dragons! Look at the size of them! My God, this is even bigger than the final battle in the Lord of the Rings movie! It's like, it's like TEN times bigger than that battle!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Hell. Satan is watching the battle through his crystal ball

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No! NO! How are we losing?!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: The child's soul is in Heaven! God has his secret weapon!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: We'll retreat!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Patience, my Lord!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: No, Kevin!  That's it! I'm breaking up with you!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Heaven. Kenny's still at it

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yesss. Yes, Kenny! Satan's forces are retreating! This is TRULY a sight to behold! OH I wish I had a camcorder! We have done it! We have defeated the armies of Satan!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Kenny! Bless your soul! You've saved all of Heaven!

title: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER
text: Yes, Kenny! And to thank you for all you've done, we are going to give you a very special gift. For saving the entire universe from the forces of evil, we give you this.  Keanu Reeves' statue. Congratulations.
